## Conversion.Converters.stringArray variable

[Converter](./ts-utils.converter.md) to convert an `unknown` to an array of `string`<!-- -->.

**Signature:**

```typescript
stringArray: Converter<string[], unknown>
```

## Remarks

Returns [Success](./ts-utils.success.md) with the the supplied value if it as an array of strings, returns [Failure](./ts-utils.failure.md) with an error message otherwise.
